name: 魏暘
objective:
本課程介紹利用質量、能量守恆定律(熱力學第一定律)及均衡方程式(熱力學第二定律)討論單成份系統狀態變化與相平衡問題。最後延伸至多成份系統相平衡的熱力學性質的探討。
This course is designed as an introductory course in thermodynamics of chemical engineering. Topics include the first and second law of thermodynamics, open and closed system, thermodynamics properties of materials, general correlations with real fluids and multi-component systems, with additional  emphasis on the thermodynamic properties in phase equilibrium of solution.
schedule:
Introduction of Thermodynamics (第一週）
Phase Diagrams of Pure Fluids（第二、三週）
Energy and the First Law（第四、五週）
Entropy and the Second Law（第六、七、八週）
Mid-term exam（第九週）
Properties of Solution （第十、十一、十二週）
Phase Equilibrium（第十三、十四、十五週）
Flow Process（第十六、十七週）
Final exam（第十八週）
